values: If something is explicit, it is very clear, open, and truthful.
The man gave a very explicit account of the car accident.
adj. 明确的；清楚的；直率的；详述的
adj. fully revealed or expressed without vagueness, implication, or ambiguity 直截了当的
adj. fully developed or formulated 详述的
